item1:
产品替代包装单位基本数据的查询
Query basic article alternative unit data
item2:
可查询所有已下传的产品包装基本数据
Query basic data of all article alternative unit
item4:
SAP下传相关产品包装基本数据
SAP downloads basic data of related article alternative unit
item5:
Article No, GTIN No
Article No, GTIN No
输出
item6:
产品包装基本数据
article alternative unit data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的产品包装数据，系统将提示查无产品包装信息
If there is no article alternative unit data that meets the requirements, the system will prompt to check that there is no article alternative unit information
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选GTIN No后点选Query查询产品包装基本数据
Enter query conditions or select GTIN No and click Query to query basic data of article alternative unit
2. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
3. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
